page.title: 08LOWER CASTLETON FARM
page.content: Lower Castleton has 84 acres and grows mainly grass.The family handles everything on the farm. Mr Leonard George is the owner of the farm. It uses tractors - 1 International, 1 Ferguson, 1 Leyland. Mr George takes milk and calves to Haverfordwest market on a Tuesday. The farm uses a hay maker, fertilizer, spreader and roller. There are about 5 sheds, the milking parlour, loose housing shed, silage shed and calf pens. There's 80 Guernsey cows and 5 beef. The farm has 1 sheep dog, a collie called Patch.
